name: Astro Shoot: Android Version
description:
WHAT IS ASTRO SHOOT?

Astro Shoot is a simple arcade space-shooter where you have the task of defeating all the enemies!

 HOW DOES IT WORK?

Using the d-pad in the game you can move the ship, while with the "SHOOT" button you can shoot lasers with which you will destroy the enemies!

 SKIN

There are various skins in the game to use in the game!

Every now and then new skins will be added and they will

be completely free from the start!

This is the Android version of the game!
